name: Pandemonium Quest
description:
Hello! For our capstone we developed a game with social distancing as a focus and we made this game: Pandemonium Quest! It is a Stealth-Puzzle game with top-camera style of camera view. Please do enjoy the Dark, Broody, and Gritty environment that we implemented in the game!

Developers: gemmmarbella, krux8d, fuannai

We would like to request your cooperation for our Capstone if you played Pandemonium Quest by answering a simple survey.

Survey Link: https://forms.gle/fENbcp1GaFZ2Y54P8

Thank you!
